title: Pictures of You
description: USA Today Bestseller Jane Anthony weaves a gripping tale of love, loss, hope, and second chances.Charlotte Hargrove lived a picture-perfect life until the day her world was shattered by the sudden suicide of her boyfriend - Creek Falls golden boy, Ryan Shaye.Fraught with guilt, she finds herself unable to move forward. Then a chance meeting throws Khyle Hammond in her path.The two become unlikely friends - a guy obsessed with death, and a girl who can't escape it. As their friendship grows stronger, Khyle becomes a witness to Charlotte's pain, and she begins to wonder if the boy she once loved wasn't as perfect as she thought.Pictures of You charts a course through grief, love, and everything in between. This heartbreaking novel begs the question, how far will you go for someone you love?*This book tackles sensitive subjects such as teen suicide and abortion. Please take into consideration before reading.
author: Jane Anthony
